name: V.P.S.C (Very.Particular.Space.Citizen) #3 – Sasha Stressard
description: [V.P.S.C (Very particular Space Citizen) #3 – Sasha Stressard]   Portrait of a very particular Space Citizen.  Sasha Stressard. Don't engage him in your business. He's probably the most stressed, stickiest guy in the galaxy.   128 frames 3D animation loop by @Mosieur_Costard
